name: Fortnight (Bouncing Turtle)
description:
Made in under 72 hours for Mini-Jam 94
Limitation: Use only two buttons
In this case, left and right-click

Fortnight is a small rogue-like strategy game where terrible robots have taken over the world. Stay alive for 14 days and their batteries will run out.

Art by Matt Walkden
https://mattwalkden.itch.io/free-robot-warfare-pack
